name: open-music-api
author: farismnrr
description: A back-end API for managing music data, built with Node.js and Hapi framework.

scripts.build: npm install && bun run copy-env && bun run migrate up
scripts.build:local: npm run build && bun run start:dev
scripts.build:server: npm run build && echo HOST=0.0.0.0 > .env.production && sudo npm i -g pm2 && pm2 start bun --name "open-music-api" -- run start:prod
scripts.build:docker: docker build -t farismnrr/open-music:1.0 . && bun run start:docker
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext js --exec "bun run src/server.js"
scripts.start:docker: npm run build && docker run -d -p 5000:5000 --name open-music farismnrr/open-music:1.0
